description: Detect potential persistence via the creation of an excel add-in (XLL) file to make it run automatically when Excel is started.
author: frack113
name: Potential Persistence Via Excel Add-in - Registry
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*Software\\Microsoft\\Office\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Excel\\Options AND winlog.event_data.Details:\/R\ * AND winlog.event_data.Details:*.xll)
